page.title: 04Everton
page.content:
{ Everton}is built on land sloping down to the city. There isn't much left of the old village apart from the street name{Village St}and the old{'lock-up'.
Today the area is a suburb of L'pool and it is changing from a{ densely populated residential area to an inner city{park;}the 1st built this century.
The area is very run down, with a large number of{derelict}properties. A sample count of maisonettes within the boundaries of the proposed park showed {80%} vacant. A large number of these properties are{ vandalised} or boarded up to stop vandals from wrecking them.
3 blocks just outside the area are in such condition they are known as the {'piggeries'.} Such conditions have created many social problems.
